===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|musical instrument}} a [[cylindrical]] [[double]]-[[reed]] [[woodwind]] [[instrument]] made of [[bamboo]] or [[wood]]
# {{lb|zh|musical instrument|by extension}} any [[wind instrument]]
# {{lb|zh|by extension}} [[slender]] [[tubular]] [[hollow]] object; [[pipe]]; [[tube]]; [[duct]]; [[canal]]; [[valve]]; [[fistula]]
#: {{zh-x|吸管|straw}}
# {{†}} [[writing]] [[brush]]
# {{zh-classifier|[[tube]]-shaped objects}}
# to [[administer]]; to [[manage]]; to [[control]]; to be [[in charge]]
#: {{zh-x|管理|to manage}}
# to [[subject]] someone to [[discipline]]; to [[discipline]]
# to [[concern]] oneself with; to [[interfere]] with
# to be [[responsible]] for the [[provision]] of; to [[provide]]; to [[supply]]; to [[guarantee]]
# [[despite]]; [[regardless]] of; [[irrespective]] of
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{n-g|used in the pattern {{zh-l|管……[[叫]]……|to call (someone the name of)}}, where {{lang|zh|管}} is followed by the object of the verb}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal|colloquial}} {{n-g|indicates the object of an action:}} [[to]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|かん}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=かん|管|tr={{IPAchar|/kuɑn<sup>X</sup>/}}||pipe, tube}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|かん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かん|hhira=くわん}}

# {{l|en|pipe}}
# a {{l|en|wind instrument}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くだ}}
From {{der|ja|ojp|sort=くだ|管|tr=kuda||pipe, tube}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くだ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|莩}} {{qualifier|rare}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くだ}}

# a {{l|en|pipe}} or {{l|en|tube}}, such as that made of {{l|en|bamboo}}, {{l|en|wood}}, {{l|en|metal}}, or {{l|en|rubber}}
# a {{l|en|shuttle}} for {{l|en|weaving}} with a {{l|en|loom}} {{qualifier|from the way the earliest shuttles were made from bamboo tubes}}
# the central {{l|en|axis}} of a {{l|en|spindle}} for winding the {{l|en|thread}}
# short for {{m|ja|管の笛|tr=kuda no fue}}, a kind of small {{l|en|pipe}} or {{l|en|flute}} used for {{l|en|signalling}} during a {{l|en|battle}}, similar to a {{l|en|fife}}
# an {{l|en|agricultural}} {{l|en|tool}}, used to gather up cut {{l|en|rice}} {{l|en|stalk}}s
# short for {{m|ja|管狐|tr=kudagitsune}}, a kind of {{l|en|mythical}} {{l|en|fox}} roughly the size of a {{l|en|weasel}}, that would live in {{l|en|bamboo}} {{l|en|stalk}}s and make {{l|en|prophesy|prophesies}} of the {{l|en|future}}
